candidate-list-template.title: Candidates' list

headers.birthplace-instructions: Instructions on how to fill in the place of birth
headers.birthplace-instructions-abroad: - Candidate born abroad: fill in the “Country” and “Name of birth city” columns and
headers.birthplace-instructions-france: - Candidate born in France: write France in the “Country” column
headers.birthplace-instructions-france-insee: - If Insee code: only fill in the “Insee code” column
headers.birthplace-instructions-france-postal: - If postcode: fill in the “Postcode” and “Name of birth city” columns
headers.born-abroad: Candidate born abroad: “Insee code” 99 AND “Name of birth city”
headers.born-in-france: Candidate born in France: “Insee code” OR “Postcode” and “Name of birth city”
headers.email-results: Email of the results' recipient (instructor, teacher…)

candidate-list-template.tooltip-line-1: (Required in particular when purchasing combined credits)
candidate-list-template.tooltip-line-2: It must be comprised of the organisation’s SIRET and of the invoice’s number. Ex: 12345678912345/FACT12345.
candidate-list-template.tooltip-line-3: If you don’t have an invoice, a prepayment code must be set with Pix.

tooltips.email-format:
Your email address must contain an “@” and a “.” Exemple: name@exemple.com. 
 This field is optional, it is used to facilitate the candidates’ convocation.
tooltips.email-results:
If this field isn’t filled in, the results won't be transmitted by email for the affected candidate(s). 
 The candidate will see their results displayed directly on their Pix account.
tooltips.extra-time:
Field required if the candidate benefits from extra time to complete their certification. 
 A whole number included between 1 and 99% expressed in percentage is expected (ex: 33%)

params.oneTimeLink: This is a one-time use link

certification-confirmation.absolute-max-level-indication: When the 8 levels of the Pix framework will be available, that maximum number will be of 1024 pix.
certification-confirmation.max-reachable-level-indication: * At the date of the successful completion of this certification, the number of acheivable pix was { maxReachableScore }, corresponding to a level { maxReachableLevelOnCertificationDate }.

certification-result-email.title: View the results of the certification session n° {sessionId} !

params.doNotReply: This is an automatic email, please do not reply.
params.emailValidFor: This link is valid for thirty days.
params.guidelines: The reporting transmitted by the certification centre has been taken into account - if need be - by the Pix examining body. You will find guidelines to help you read these results here.
params.overviewText: Hello, here are the results of the certifications that you have recommended to your audiences
params.resultsAvailable: The results of the Pix certifications that you have recommended to your audiences are available.
params.subject: [Pix] Certification session
params.viewResultsInProfile: The candidates can view their result in their Pix profile.

headers.JURY_COMMENT_FOR_ORGANIZATION: Examining body’s comment for the organisation

values.REJECTED_AUTOMATICALLY_COMMENT: The candidate did not answer correctly to more than 50% of the questions asked, this invalidated his entire certification, and therefore resulted in a score of 0 pix
